thread.title: Why the Taliban taking Afghanistan's Kunduz matters
thread.title_full: Why the Taliban taking Afghanistan's Kunduz matters

title: Why the Taliban taking Afghanistan's Kunduz matters
text:
30 Why the Taliban taking Afghanistan's Kunduz matters 
CNN:The loss of the major city of Kunduz to the Taliban is a stunning reversal for the Afghan government, deepening worries about the ability of its security forces to take the fight to the Islamic militants.Afghan officials vowed to quickly drive the Taliban back out again from the northern provincial capital where the insurgents freed hundreds of inmates from a prison and raised their white flag at points around town.
